title: 2013/699/EU: Council Decision of 25 November 2013 appointing a Latvian member and two Latvian alternate members of the Committee of the Regions
header:
30.11.2013 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 320/43
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 November 2013
appointing a Latvian member and two Latvian alternate members of the Committee of the Regions
(2013/699/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Latvian Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU (1) and 2010/29/EU (2) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015.
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Guntars KRIEVIŅŠ.
(3) An alternate member’s seat has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Viktors GLUHOVS. An alternate member’s seat will become vacant following the appointment of Mr Jānis VĪTOLIŅŠ as member of the Committee of the Regions,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
(a) as member:
— Mr Jānis VĪTOLIŅŠ, First Deputy Chairman of Ventspils City Council
(b) as alternate members:
— Mr Gunārs ANSIŅŠ, Deputy Chairman of Liepāja City Council
— Ms Olga VEIDIŅA, Chairman of the Social Issues Committee of Rīga City Council.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 November 2013.
For the Council
The President
D. PAVALKIS
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22.
(2)  OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
